content:
Today, March 17, as a result of impact of ballistic missiles on Nikolaev there are injured, damaged private homes.

About thisreportedThe mayor of Nikolaev Alexander Senkevich.

“The situation is now. Many private homes were damaged - windows, roofs. Windows flew into apartments. Damaged cars. 5 people were injured, ”said Alexander Senkevich.

He stressed that more detailed figures will be after surveying the arrival area.

As reportedArmyinform, over the past 24 hours, Russian troops fired at the territory of 10 regions of Ukraine, 129 settlements have suffered hostile attacks.
title: Russia attacked Nikolaev Balism: 5 wounded, damaged private homes
description: The mayor of Nikolaev Alexander Senkevich reported. “The situation is now. Damaged ...
author: Army Inform
